INSERT INTO tbl_book(isbn13,license_id,subject_id,title,contents,url,publish_date,authors,publisher,translators,price,sale_price,thumbnail,status) VALUES
(#{item.isbn13},#{item.licenseId},#{item.subjectId},#{item.title},#{item.contents},#{item.url},#{item.publishDate}, #{item.authors},#{item.publisher},#{item.translators},#{item.price},#{item.salePrice},#{item.thumbnail},#{item.status})
